products.title: Haier HD90-A3959 9kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer - White
products.body_html:
Haier HD90-A3959 9kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer - White

Experience flawless laundry drying with the Haier i-Pro Series 5 tumble dryer, ideal for your family's needs. With a generous 9kg capacity and cutting-edge heat pump technology, you can achieve impeccably fresh and clean garments regardless of the prevailing weather conditions.

Haier Technology for Superior Results

When it comes to exceptional clothing care, the Haier i-Pro Series 5 tumble dryer reigns supreme. This advanced appliance is equipped with an array of innovative technologies, enabling you to effortlessly conquer your laundry pile.

Harnessing the power of Wi-Fi connectivity, the HD90-A3959 can be seamlessly controlled using your smartphone and the hOn app. With over 60 specialized cycles tailored to different fabric types, you can easily select and personalize the perfect drying program. Additionally, receive valuable tips on effective stain removal and monitor energy efficiency and consumption, even when you're away from home. Enjoy the added convenience of quick troubleshooting to maintain optimal machine performance and reliability.

The ingenious I-Time function grants you complete control over drying duration, enabling you to customize cycles to suit your specific requirements. Moreover, the I-Refresh feature leverages vapor technology derived from the water reservoir, rejuvenating garments to reduce wrinkles and enhance fabric softness. This remarkable capability is suitable for all types of clothing, including delicate fabrics.

Haier Programmes for Unmatched Flexibility

The HD90-A3959 incorporates a comprehensive selection of 12 programs, offering unparalleled versatility. These cycles include:

  • High Heat
  • Low Heat
  • Cotton
  • Synthetics
  • Delicates
  • Jeans
  • Sportswear

When time is of the essence, take advantage of the Quick-Dry cycle, which rapidly dries up to 0.5kg of clothing in just 30 minutes, perfect for those impromptu plans. Benefit from the Sensor drying programs that automatically halt the cycle once the desired level of dryness is achieved. Additionally, the reverse action drum ensures your garments remain free from tangles.

Effortless Control and Convenience

Featuring user-friendly dial controls and an intuitive LED display, operating this model is a breeze. The inclusion of a practical child lock prevents unintended adjustments by curious little hands. Furthermore, the reversible doors offer flexible placement options, allowing you to position the appliance wherever it suits you best.

products.title: Blomberg LTIP07310 7kg Integrated Heat Pump Tumble Dryer White
products.body_html:
Blomberg LTIP07310 7kg Integrated Heat Pump Tumble Dryer White

Revolutionary Heat Pump Technology

Experience the future of energy-efficient laundry with the Blomberg LTIP07310. This integrated heat pump tumble dryer harnesses cutting-edge heat pump technology to recycle and reuse hot air. Not only does this make it a sustainable choice for your home, but it's also a smart way to save on your electricity bills. Say goodbye to the hassle of venting your dryer outside and hello to valuable space savings. The LTIP07310 ingeniously extracts moisture from the drum, converting it back into water, offering unparalleled convenience.

Versatile Programmes for Every Fabric

Select from a diverse range of 15 programmes, including Cotton, Synthetics, Delicate, Jeans, Babywear, Sportswear, Mix, Refresh, and Bedding. Choose the one that best suits your laundry load, and with this array of options, you'll never have to worry about clothes shrinking again.

Intelligent Sensor Programmes

Can't decide on the right cycle? The LTIP07310 has your back with its sensor programmes, which can automatically determine the optimal drying settings for your clothes. This not only saves time and energy but also takes the guesswork out of the equation. Stay informed about your cycle's progress with the convenient LED display.

Exceptional Capacity and Ease of Use

This Blomberg model boasts a generous 7kg capacity, providing ample space to dry even family-sized loads in one go. The intuitive dial and button controls are user-friendly, and the built-in child lock ensures that little hands won't disrupt your settings.

Effortless Wrinkle Prevention

Dread ironing? The automatic anti-crease function on this Blomberg tumble dryer can be set to periodically tumble your laundry for up to two hours. Bid farewell to wrinkles and creases, and make your life that much easier.

Flexible Placement and Minimalistic Design

As a freestanding model, you have the freedom to choose the perfect spot for your Blomberg tumble dryer. Its sleek, minimalist design in white seamlessly blends into any decor. Plus, the continuous delay feature allows you to start a cycle at your convenience.

Key Features at a Glance

  • Heat Pump Technology: Redefining energy usage, this dryer maintains gentle drying temperatures around 60°C, minimizing energy consumption.
  • Sensor Drying Programmes: Tailor your laundry's dryness level with our intelligent sensor programmes that automatically stop when your desired dryness is achieved.
  • Interior Light: Easily locate small, often-forgotten laundry items with the interior light, making unloading a breeze.
  • Automatic Anti-Creasing Function: Program this function to reduce creases in your clothes, even if you can't unload the laundry right away.
  • Stylish Digital Display: The modern digital display simplifies cycle selection and provides a countdown timer for added convenience in planning your day.

    Invest in the Blomberg LTIP07310 for an eco-friendly, cost-saving, and hassle-free laundry experience. Discover the future of home drying with our cutting-edge heat pump technology and intelligent features.

products.title: Samsung Series 5 DV90CGC0A0AEEU with OptimalDry 9 kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer White
products.body_html:
Samsung Series 5 DV90CGC0A0AEEU with OptimalDry 9 kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer White

Introducing the Samsung Series 5 DV90CGC0A0AEEU Heat Pump Tumble Dryer, 9kg, featuring groundbreaking OptimalDry™ technology for efficient and gentle drying.

Experience Efficient Drying

Revolutionize your laundry routine with our Heat Pump Technology, designed to dry clothes efficiently while being gentle even on delicate fabrics. By reheating the air in the drum, this innovative technology consumes less electricity compared to traditional dryers, saving both money and the environment.

Versatile Drying Options

Say goodbye to damp laundry with our Hygiene Care feature, ensuring thorough drying for towels, bedding, clothes, and more. With high temperatures infused into every load, even unwashed items receive hygienic treatment, leaving your laundry fresh and clean.

Smart and Intuitive Operation

Experience the future of laundry with our smart tumble dryer, which learns and adapts to your family's laundry habits. With a user-friendly control panel and seamless integration with the SmartThings app, managing laundry cycles has never been easier. Receive cycle progress notifications on your phone, schedule drying sessions, and even allow your washing machine to recommend optimal drying settings.

Efficient Energy Management

Monitor and control energy usage in real-time with SmartThings AI Energy mode, potentially reducing energy consumption by up to 70%. Take charge of your energy usage with daily, weekly, and monthly energy consumption insights.

Reliable Home Care

For added peace of mind, utilize Smart Check on the Samsung SmartThings app to troubleshoot any issues with your tumble dryer independently. No need to call for service – Smart Check guides you through problem-solving steps directly on your smartphone.

Customizable Door Opening

Adapt your tumble dryer to suit your space with the reversible door feature, allowing you to choose between left or right-side opening. Enjoy effortless loading and unloading, especially when positioned next to your washing machine.

Wrinkle-Free Results

Simplify ironing tasks with the Wrinkle Prevent setting, which cools clothes down and rotates the drum after drying to minimize creases. Enjoy smoother, wrinkle-free garments straight from the dryer.

Optimal Drying Efficiency

Benefit from OptimalDry™ technology, which adjusts drying time using moisture and temperature sensors to protect clothes from damage while optimizing energy usage.

Quick and Convenient Drying

In a rush? The 35 Minute Quick Dry cycle ensures your favorite garments are ready in no time, perfect for last-minute wardrobe changes or urgent laundry needs.

Enhanced Maintenance

Maintain peak drying performance with our 2-in-1 filter system, collecting fluff to reduce the frequency of heat exchange filter cleaning. Receive reminders when filter maintenance is due, ensuring consistent drying performance.

Refresh Your Clothes Easily

Give your clothes a quick refresh with the Air Wash feature, eliminating odors and rejuvenating fabrics with a gentle, steaming air cycle. Ideal for extending the wear of lightly worn garments between washes.

Bosch WTH85223GB Series 4 8kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer White

Bosch Series 4 WTH85223GB Freestanding Heat Pump Tumble Dryer – 8kg Load White

The Bosch Series 4 WTH85223GB Heat Pump Tumble Dryer is the smarter, quieter, and more energy-efficient way to handle your laundry. With an 8kg capacity, this freestanding heat pump dryer is perfect for family households, offering advanced features that care for your clothes while saving energy and reducing noise.

Designed with Bosch's signature heat pump technology, this machine requires no venting—just plug it in and start drying. Equipped with features like AutoDry sensors, an anti-vibration design, and a wool cycle to protect delicate knits, this tumble dryer is packed with innovative solutions that make laundry care effortless.

Key Features of Bosch Heat Pump Tumble Dryer:

Efficient AutoDry Technology
With Bosch's AutoDry sensors, the machine continuously monitors the moisture and temperature levels, ensuring your clothes are dried to perfection. Whether you prefer items slightly damp for ironing or extra-dry for folding, this feature protects your garments from overdrying and shrinking while saving energy.

Ultra-Quiet AntiVibration Design
The innovative AntiVibration side panels and enhanced insulation reduce noise levels during operation. This means you can run your Bosch tumble dryer anytime—even during a family movie night or while hosting guests—without disturbing the peace.

Environmentally Friendly Heat Pump Technology
This Bosch heat pump tumble dryer uses the world's most eco-friendly cooling agent, R290. As an environmentally conscious choice, this dryer reduces its impact on the environment while offering excellent drying performance.

Gentle Care with the Sensitive Drying System
Bosch’s Sensitive Drying System ensures your clothes are treated with care. By circulating mild, warm air from all sides and using soft paddles in the drum, your laundry is gently dried without lying flat, resulting in soft, crease-free, and fluffy fabrics.

Wool-Friendly and Delicate Cycles
This machine offers a dedicated wool cycle, allowing you to dry your favorite knits without worrying about shrinkage. It's perfect for winter essentials like sweaters and scarves.

Quick Drying in 40 Minutes
For busy households, the quick 40-minute drying cycle handles small loads of synthetic or lightweight fabrics, ensuring your essentials are ready in no time.

Why Choose the Bosch WTH85223GB Heat Pump Tumble Dryer?

  • Energy Efficiency: Heat pump technology delivers excellent drying results while using less energy than conventional dryers.
  • Family-Friendly: The 8kg drum size is ideal for medium to large households.
  • Durable and Reliable: Bosch’s renowned engineering ensures long-lasting performance.
  • Convenient Design: No venting is required—simply plug in and use anywhere in your home.

The Bosch Series 4 Heat Pump Tumble Dryer combines modern technology with environmentally friendly features, making it a smart investment for your home. Whether you're looking to cut down on energy bills, care for delicate fabrics, or enjoy ultra-quiet operation, this machine ticks all the boxes.

Upgrade to the Bosch Series 4 WTH85223GB today and experience efficient, hassle-free laundry care with the latest heat pump technology.

products.body_html:
Samsung Series 5 DV90CGC0A0ABEU with OptimalDry 9 kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer Black

Discover the Samsung Series 5 DV90CGC0A0ABEU, a cutting-edge Heat Pump Tumble Dryer designed for optimal efficiency and garment care. With a sleek black exterior and a generous 9kg capacity, this dryer combines innovative features to revolutionize your laundry routine.

OptimalDry™ Technology

Experience unparalleled efficiency with OptimalDry™ smart technology. This advanced system utilizes moisture and temperature sensors to precisely adjust drying time, ensuring your clothes are perfectly dry while minimizing energy consumption. Protect your garments and the environment with this intelligent drying solution.

Heat Pump Technology

Embrace the future of laundry care with Heat Pump Technology. By reheating the air in the drum, this technology ensures a gentle drying process even for delicate fabrics. Compared to traditional dryers, it consumes less electricity, contributing to cost savings and environmental sustainability.

Hygiene Care

Elevate your laundry hygiene with the Hygiene Care feature. This powerhouse infuses high temperatures into every load, effectively eliminating up to 99.9% of bacteria. Suitable for all types of items, washed or not, it combines power and gentleness to keep your laundry fresh and sanitized.

SmartThings Integration

Immerse yourself in a world of intelligent drying with SmartThings. The user-friendly control panel remembers your family's laundry habits, suggesting preferred cycles. Track progress through the intuitive display and receive notifications on your phone via the SmartThings app. Schedule your dryer effortlessly and utilize Auto Cycle Link for seamless coordination with your washing machine.

SmartThings Energy

Achieve energy efficiency with SmartThings AI Energy mode. Monitor real-time energy consumption, make adjustments from your smartphone, and reduce energy use by up to 70%. Make smart savings while enjoying optimal drying performance.

SmartThings Home Care

Experience hassle-free maintenance with SmartThings Home Care. Use the Smart Check feature on the Samsung SmartThings app to troubleshoot issues instantly, ensuring the longevity of your dryer without the need for professional assistance.

Reversible Door for Convenience

Tailor the placement of your dryer to your home's layout with the reversible door feature. Choose between left or right opening for easy loading and unloading, especially when positioned next to your washing machine.

Wrinkle Prevent for Effortless Ironing

Say goodbye to wrinkles and excessive ironing with the Wrinkle Prevent feature. After the cycle ends, the dryer cools clothes and rotates the drum to prevent creases, making your laundry routine more convenient.

Digital Inverter Technology

Enjoy peace of mind with Digital Inverter Technology, providing a quiet and durable tumble dryer backed by a 20-year warranty. Experience efficient and enduring performance with this state-of-the-art technology.

2-in-1 Filter for Optimal Performance

Enhance your dryer's performance with the 2-in-1 filter. Collecting fluff to reduce the frequency of heat exchange filter cleaning, it even reminds you when maintenance is required. Keep your dryer running smoothly for a longer lifespan.

Air Refresh for a Breath of Freshness

Revitalize your garments with the Air Refresh feature. Ideal for freshening up clothes without a full wash, this gentle steaming cycle banishes odors, leaving your favorite items smelling as good as new.

Quick Dry 35'

Need a rapid drying solution? The Quick Dry 35' cycle dries a load of clothes in just over half an hour, perfect for those impromptu plans. This quick and efficient feature is ideal for loads up to 1kg, ensuring your favorite garments are ready in no time.

Hotpoint Crease Care 9kg NT M11 82BSK Heat Pump Tumble Dryer: Your Ultimate Laundry Companion

Experience the perfect blend of style, efficiency, and care with the Hotpoint Crease Care 9kg NT M11 82BSK Heat Pump Tumble Dryer. This sleek black appliance is not just a pretty face; it’s packed with innovative features designed to keep your clothes fresh, soft, and crease-free.

Energy Efficiency at its Best

With an A++ energy rating, this heat pump tumble dryer is the epitome of efficiency. Unlike traditional dryers, it uses recirculated air for drying, which not only conserves energy but also protects your clothes by drying them at a cooler temperature. Crease Care for Your Convenience

Can’t unload the dryer immediately after the cycle ends? No problem! The Crease Care feature gently tumbles your laundry for up to 10 hours after the cycle has ended. This keeps your clothes free from creases, smelling fresh, and feeling soft, making it perfect for those busy days.

Thoughtful Technologies for Your Comfort

products.title: Hoover HLEH9A2DE H DRY 300 9kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer
products.body_html:
Hoover HLE H9A2DE H-DRY 300 LITE 9kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer 

H-DRY 300 LITE

Experience advanced drying features with HOOVER H-DRY 300 LITE, the perfect solution for preserving your favourite clothes' colours and fabrics. With the most comprehensive set of drying cycles, effortless laundry care is at your fingertips.  

DOUBLE FILTER 

Maintaining your tumble dryer has never been easier with Hoover's innovative Double Filter solution. Featuring two conveniently located filters inside the door, cleaning and removing them is a breeze. Keep your tumble dryer running smoothly with the effortless maintenance of Hoover's Double Filter system.  

SAFE AND RELIABLE 

Quality is Hoover's number one priority. H-DRY 300 PLUS is designed with exceptional attention to detail and new improved features like the Double Filter.  

ONE FI EXTRA 

Connect your Hoover Tumble Dryer to the cutting-edge ONE FI WI-FI remote control and Wizard App for a truly advanced and tailored drying experience. Our innovative technology provides a range of features designed to enhance your life, from customized drying programs to remote control access. Experience the future of laundry with Hoover Tumble Dryers.  

REAL CARE FOR DELICATE FABRICS 

Keep your delicate fabrics like wool and cashmere soft and bright with Hoover's gentle and precise motion technology and advanced temperature management system. The appliance is approved by Woolmark, ensuring the utmost care for your most delicate garments. Trust Hoover to preserve the natural beauty of your favorite fabrics.  

HEAT PUMP TUMBLE DRYER 

Heat Pump Tumble Dryers operate similarly to condenser tumble dryers by utilizing a heat pump to recycle hot air that is typically lost. This recycled air is then passed through the drum, resulting in exceptional energy efficiency. Heat pump tumble dryers are the most efficient type of tumble dryer available, making them an eco-friendly choice for environmentally-conscious consumers.

REUSE THE WATER, CLEVERLY
